interest_drivers: Availability of LangSmith and LangGraph Platform in AWS Marketplace
Introduction of Interrupt: The AI Agent Conference

ai_analysis.summary: The LangChain blog update highlights significant technical and business developments, including the availability of LangSmith and LangGraph Platform in AWS Marketplace, the General Availability of LangGraph Platform, and the introduction of Interrupt: The AI Agent Conference. These developments demonstrate the growing importance of AI/ML platforms and tools in various industries.

LangSmith and LangGraph Platform are now available in AWS Marketplace

LangSmith and LangGraph Platform (self-hosted deployments) are now available in AWS Marketplace.

3 MIN READ
FEATURED
LangGraph Platform is now Generally Available: Deploy & manage long-running, stateful Agents

interest_drivers: Introduction of LangChain framework for LLM application development
Stateful agents with streaming and human-in-the-loop support using LangGraph
LangSmith for application inspection, monitoring, and evaluation
ai_analysis.summary: LangChain introduces a framework for developing LLM-powered applications, simplifying development, productionization, and deployment stages with open-source components and third-party integrations.

Introduction
Introduction

LangChain is a framework for developing applications powered by large language models (LLMs).

LangChain simplifies every stage of the LLM application lifecycle:

Development: Build your applications using LangChain's open-source components and third-party integrations. Use LangGraph to build stateful agents with first-class streaming and human-in-the-loop support.
Productionization: Use LangSmith to inspect, monitor and evaluate your applications, so that you can continuously optimize and deploy with confidence.
Deployment: Turn your LangGraph appli
